images.caption: Figure 1:Accuracy for each model and prompting strategy. The results for cluster counting(top) using few-shot prompting are particularly promising for several models. On the other hand, Flash excels at the outlier countingtask (bottom) when one-shot (86.67%) and few-shot (90.49%) prompted.

Figure 2:Recall for each model and prompting strategy. None surpass 25% Recall in the cluster detection(top) and identification(middle) tasks. Recall is also low for the outlier identificationtask (bottom), although Flash, when few-shot prompted, seems promising (65.01%). Lowering the IoU to 0.5 considerably changes the results for some models, but Recall remains low (o3, when few-shot prompted, reaches a Recall of 50.26%). Doubling the distance threshold to 20px does not change the conclusions.
